#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <sstream>

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define FOR(i,n) for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)

/*
1 ≤ N ≤ 10^6
1 ≤ A ≤ 10^9
1 ≤ F ≤ 10^9

Input 1:
6
LRLRLR
3.0 4.0
*/

int main(int argc, char **argv)
{
	int N;
	cin>>N;
	
	//char *S = new[N];
	
	int curr=0, min_a=0, max_a=0;
	
	for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
	{
		char lr;
		cin>>lr;
		
		if(lr=='L')
		{
			curr--;
			if(min_a>curr)
				min_a=curr;
		}
		else
		{
			curr++;
			if(max_a<curr)
				max_a=curr;
		}
	}

	double A,F;
	cin>>A>>F;
	
	if(fabs(min_a*A)> F || ((double)(max_a * A)) >F)
		cout<<"NO";
	else
		cout<<"YES";
	return 0;
}
